name: Andrea Montermini
introduction: Andrea Montermini (born on 30 May 1964 in Sassuolo, MO, Emilia-Romagna, Italy) is an Italian racing driver who spent three years in Formula One in the mid-1990s, driving for the three worst teams around, Simtek, Pacific and Forti.  Unsurprisingly given these drives, Montermini failed to score a single point.
